price: (22) So would you perhaps, if you turned away,[1504] cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ
footnotes: [1504]- From Islām or from jihād (struggling in the cause of Allāh).
